s.text: She refers to herself as a "diva."
All lives ought to be considered equal under the law; if you kill someone because they're gay, it shouldn't be worse than killing someone because they like the Mets.
There's a chance Americans will be sending troops out to Central Asia in coming years to defend American oil interests, so we should all be reading up on this stuff.
